topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 1.0: Open Source and Third-Party Software License Agreements

body.p: The Open Source and Third-Party Software License Agreements for HPE Helion OpenStack are available as a PDF download.

You can obtain a ZIP containing source code for components where HPE has an obligation to or, in its sole discretion, chooses to make the source code for such components available under the applicable open source software license at the HPE Helion OpenStack portal.
